About me

I am looking for work in the field of software developemnet using languages / frameworks such as JS, React, Python. I have a Second Class Upper in Games Software Development, and I have recently completed the Odin Project.

My work

Battleships

A simple battleships game cooked up for the Odin Project.

Knights Travails

Uses binary search trees to find the quickest root a knight can get from one location to another in a game of chess.

Weather App

A simple website that uses APIs to fetch weather information for a location specified by the user.

Image Carousel

A simple image carousel.

Form Validation

A simple exercise in form validation for odin.

Recipes

A simple website cooked up at the begining of the Odin course.
